mapper.select:
select cm.*, cf.follow_person_id,cf.follow_time, ui.user_name from change_follow cf left join change_manager cm on cf.follow_change_id = cm.change_id left join user_info ui on cf.follow_person_id = ui.user_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}

select cm.*, cf.follow_person_id,cf.follow_time,ui.user_name from change_follow cf left join change_manager cm on cf.follow_change_id = cm.change_id left join user_info ui on cf.follow_person_id = ui.user_info_id
${ew.customSqlSegment}
